Way to go!
Excellent!
Good Job! Select Frequency (Minutes) Medical Studies A large long-term study with 7744 participants looked into sedentary behavior and risk of cardiovascular disease mortality in men over a 21 year period. It found sedentary behavior increased risk of death from cardiovascular disease by 64 percent. A Danish medical study that looked into factors which decreased life quality found sedentary lifestyles reduced the quality-adjusted life years by 7 years. A British research study found that even exercising for more than 30 minutes a day might not be enough to counteract the negative effects of sitting for prolonged periods of time. Sitting for prolonged periods of time may contribute to metabolic diseases such as diabetes and cardiovascular disease. News Articles Lifehacker BBC The Economist Businessweek New York Times NBC News Open Closed " minutes ago" " minute ago" " minutes" " minute" Take A Stand Schedule is Running Alarm day is over. "Schedule " New Title OK Cancel Schedule Running Settings Stand Reminder Frequency Set Default Notification Schedules am pm LED Light Vibrate Sound Next Alert At: Stood Delay Frequency Start Time End Time S M T W T F S Stand Reminder Frequency Reminder Settings StandDtector™: ON StandDtector™: OFF Calibrate StandDtector™ Science Behind The App Calibration To calibrate, the phone must be in your pocket and you must be sitting. The phone will Vibrate once, indicating you should stand. Once calibration is complete, the phone will vibrate again. Once you press OK, you will have 5 seconds to put the phone in your pocket and be sitting before you feel the first vibration. No stand reminder schedules yet \n \n Click to Add Vibrate on silent Repeat vibrate/sound reminders when it is time to stand Every NotificationsActivity Notification Reminder Frequency Hello world! Notification Settings\ If pausing for a set time, the next reminder will happen your default frequency minutes after the paused time has passed (20 minute frequency and 30 minute pause = next stand reminder in 50 minutes) Paused until: Select Pause Type Pause indefinitely Pause for a set time
